org.logevents.util.pattern

Class StringScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.logevents.util.pattern.StringScanner

  • public class StringScanner
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility method used to handle PatternLogEventFormatter parsing. Keeps an internal string and a position. Use current() advance() and hasMoreCharacters() to parse the string according to custom rules.
    Author:
    Johannes Brodwall

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringScanner(java.lang.String string) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char advance()
      Returns the current character and advances the current position by one.
      char current()
      Returns the current character.
      boolean hasMoreCharacters()
      Returns true if the current position is before the end of the parsed string.
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> readInteger()
      Reads a signed integer.
      java.lang.String readUntil(char... terminatorsArray)
      Advances the current position until the terminator is reached or the position reaches the end of the string.
      void skipWhitespace()
      Advances the current position over all current whitespace.
      java.lang.String toString()

    • Constructor Detail

      • StringScanner

        public StringScanner(java.lang.String string)

    • Method Detail

      • hasMoreCharacters

        public boolean hasMoreCharacters()
        Returns true if the current position is before the end of the parsed string.

      • advance

        public char advance()
        Returns the current character and advances the current position by one.

      • current

        public char current()
        Returns the current character.

      • skipWhitespace

        public void skipWhitespace()
        Advances the current position over all current whitespace. If the current position is not a whitespace when skipWhitespace() is called, this method has no effect.

      • readUntil

        public java.lang.String readUntil(char... terminatorsArray)
        Advances the current position until the terminator is reached or the position reaches the end of the string. The current position remains at the terminator.
        Parameters:
        terminatorsArray - The characters to scan for
        Returns:
        The substring until the terminator, not including terminator

      • readInteger

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> readInteger()
        Reads a signed integer. Returns Optional.empty() if the current character isn't '-' or a digit.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
